title: mannittukkoL ayyanE
sahitya:
mannitukkkoL ayyanE en mana vAkkuk-kAyattin vinaiyAl varum pizhaiyai


anupallavi

  unnaDimai yAn ennum urimaiyAl enait-tirutti


caraNam    pulamAya vEDariDam poi aghankArariDam balamAyak-kaLLariDam parivaTra kapaTariDam
alai mOdi valai mOdi ayarndunadu tiruvaDiyai nilaiyenru paTrinEn nIyinri gatiyillai
